titleInfo.title: Small sequence variants between the Musa acuminata cultivars Dwarf Cavendish and DH Pahang

mods.abstract: This is an updated version of https://doi.org/10.4119/unibi/2936278. Additional filter steps have been applied to generate this high confidence variant set. Please see https://doi.org/10.1101/691923 for a description of the data set and applied methods.
